__e: You can't make a gesture, but I can make a gesture.
You made a grand gesture, but she still hasn't said anything to you, has she?
Thanks for the gesture, but I got this.
A gesture of goodwill... from a father to his son.
It's a goodwill gesture from me to you.
After all, an act of good will is what counts.
Between that and the hand gesture, i'm afraid that our unsub's married with children.
I can do anything. All I have to do is wave my hand.
Sir, I think I noticed the Captain... make a sort of a move with his hand.
Sir, I think I noticed the Captain... make a sort of a move with his hand.
And even now, after I return Nate's property. As a goodwill gesture, he refuses to believe.
I can do anything. All I have to do is wave my hand.
Move another inch, And I'll blow your head off.
Make one move, and I swear you're dead.
I'm not dead yet, you move an inch and I'll put you down for good.
But depending on your answer, perhaps I might be persuaded to spare the boy's life.
You might want to make the first move and find another city.
You are so full of it. All I'm asking for is a gesture, and you can't even do that.
Well, sometimes the gift is really about the gesture, you know, like what it means instead of what it is.
Doesn't matter what it is, it's a nice gesture.
I know that they were a gift and it's all about the thought and...
If you wanna make a stand for Earth, now is the time.
You feel bad about it. You think things over, and in the end you do the grand gesture for her.
My father has done everything for him. He could do this one thing for my dad.
Put him down! Nobody move! Or I break him in two!
Don't you move. I'll put a bullet in you!
Do not move another inch or I swear to God I'll shoot.
You make one move and you're dead!
It means, I want to know if this is a gesture or if it's a move.
Do not move another inch or I swear to God I'll shoot.
